screens.title: Welcome to Hubstaff
screens.message: The secure, lightweight desktop app that lets you track your time and activity.

screens.title: Track time to projects or to-dos
screens.message: Create, manage, and complete to-dos right in the app. Import tasks using an integration and add notes while you work.

screens.title: Monitor your activity
screens.message: While tracking time, the app can detect keyboard and mouse activity and take screenshots as proof of work (if settings are enabled).

screens.title: Adjust settings
screens.message: You can customize settings to remind you when to track time or tell you when screenshots are taken. Just look in your app preferences.

screens.title: You’re in control
screens.message: You decide when to start and stop the timer and can delete your time and data anytime. Proof of work features are only active when you’re tracking time.
